name: SeaLocked
description:
Play as a wilderness survivor who's stuck at sea and discover all the challenges of living in nature.
Watch out for crabs and squids!

Note: you start out with a gold pick. This is for easy mode for the game jam. If you want to play it on regular difficulty, just discard the pick by dragging it outside of your hotbar.

Controls (We have key input remapping though) WASDMoveLeft ClickAttack, Consume (click hotbar)Right ClickCancel craftingPPause/Settings menu1-9Select inventory slot Credits

Programmer and artist - Nothing#3367 (Itch page)
Sound Designer and composer - OctiRotger#4399
A thank you to Silivar#2970 who helped with some of the pixel art.

Game made for Godot Wild Jam #41 with the theme of Ocean.
